aboutme1: Hi, I'm a German-speaking fullstack developer from near Frankfurt. Motivated by the diverse possibilities in web development, I am enthusiastic about developing visually appealing and intuitive websites and applications.
aboutme2: I am flexible in terms of distance as I like to work from home.
aboutme3: I am always open to new technologies and challenges to constantly improve my knowledge and skills.
aboutme4: For me, programming is much more than just writing code. It is a creative way of solving problems. I pride myself on my ability to turn complex technical challenges into simple, user-friendly solutions. In this way, I help you achieve your goals so that you can benefit from them.
skills1: I have gained experience in the creation of projects with different technologies and concepts.
skills3: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.
